message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $120. It's a great opportunity to get a high-quality item that you'll find very valuable.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! That product looks great, but $120 is a bit too steep for me right now. Would you consider $85?
Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your feedback. In order to accommodate your budget, I am willing to negotiate the price down to $95. I hope this revised offer meets your expectations.
